## IStyleable.addStyle() method

Adds a style on the toolbox. Usually used to change the cursor.

**Signature:**

```typescript
addStyle(style: string): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  style | string | The name of the class to add. |

**Returns:**

void
